item.title: Need help with my minigame 317
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

hi, I just want to know how can I make people cant join the minigame if this is already started? The minigame is working fine so i just want the correct syntax of:

if (a player is in the game) { sM("a game is already started, please wait") } else... (i already have the rest of the code)

Read full topic
